name: Infirmary Exploration
description:
To Play:

  1. Download the ZIP folder
  2. Unzip it using your archiving software of choice
  3. Double click the "UpdatedEngine2" EXE file
  4. Your OS may prevent it from running*, click 'more info' and then 'run anyway'

Controls

  • Move: WASD
  • Character select: < >
  • Pause: Esc
  • Unpause: P
  • Credits screen: When in third level, press E

This is work in progress of a game I made for uni. I will continue to work on it when I have finished uni, when I have more free time.

*This is because the source is an 'unknown publisher'. While this sounds scary, *I* am the publisher, OSs just like to protect against potential threats, which I assue you I am not.
